566bdc2d-7c4a-4547-87da-ac81447ecca8.Statement: the primary trial results show that the Trastuzumab Plus Capecitabine group had a higher precentage of patients with Grade 3 or 4 skin/subcutaneous or pulmonary toxicities, than the Lapatinib Plus Capecitabine group.
566bdc2d-7c4a-4547-87da-ac81447ecca8.Label: Contradiction

d310ec4e-993e-4827-8dc5-9aca053972db.Statement: The the primary trial intervention involves one drug taken orally and the secondary trial intervention is based on a medical procedure.
d310ec4e-993e-4827-8dc5-9aca053972db.Label: Contradiction

a5617ae4-05a3-42d0-9e14-141de5f8c010.Statement: the secondary trial reported 1 single case of Conjunctivitis, whereas the primary trial did not report any
a5617ae4-05a3-42d0-9e14-141de5f8c010.Label: Entailment

42d1fcd3-8faa-4065-bbba-42cc90ab67fb.Statement: the secondary trial and the primary trial do not both measure the pCR of their patient cohorts.
42d1fcd3-8faa-4065-bbba-42cc90ab67fb.Label: Entailment

d01fda83-5dc8-4ad5-92b8-7553dabd7046.Statement: the outcome measurement of the primary trial is The length of time during and after the treatment, that a patient lives with the disease but it does not get worse
d01fda83-5dc8-4ad5-92b8-7553dabd7046.Label: Entailment

985bc5a0-bc21-447f-92f1-150e23ede3f5.Statement: All the primary trial patients had a minimum of 50% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions
985bc5a0-bc21-447f-92f1-150e23ede3f5.Label: Contradiction
